item.title: Mattel’s OpenAI Product Launch Slips Beyond Holiday 2025 As Toymaker Takes Cautious Approach To AI: Report
item.description: The toymaker confirmed to Axios on Monday that the company will not hit its original target of announcing a product in 2025.

item.title: Costco Stock Heads For Worst Day In A Month On Rare Sell Call — Jim Cramer Rings The Valuation Alarm
item.description: Costco shares fell after a rare sell call, with concerns over slowing membership and a steep valuation.

item.title: Walmart, Target Face FDA Heat After Recalled Baby Formula Tied To Infant Botulism Found In Stores
item.description: The FDA sent letters dated Dec. 12 to both Walmart and Target, highlighting that the recalled baby formula was found on the shelves at multiple stores...

item.title: Uber Stock Slips Toward 7-Month Lows After Regulators Step Up Case Over Billing And Cancellations — Retail Calls The Dip A Buy
item.description: Uber shares slid as regulators escalated a subscription lawsuit, while retail investors called the dip a buy.
